channel.title: Music – Jon Secada

item.title: Jon Secada - Angel
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8816

I I can’t read
the future
But I still want to
hold you close
Right now
I need that from you
So give me the morning
sharing another day
With you
is all I want to know
And baby I I’ve tried
to forget you
But the light
of your eyes
Still shines you shine
like an angel
A spirit that won’t
let me go-

I I didn’t want
to tell you
Things I didn’t wanna
know myself
I was afraid to show
but you you
Gave me a reason
a reason
To face the truth
oh yes you did
To face the truth
face the truth
Face the truth
and baby I
I’ve tried to
forget you
But the light
of your eyes
Still shines shines
shines like an angel
A spirit that won’t
let me go
Won’t let me go
let go of my heart-

And baby I I’ve tried
to forget you
But the light of you
eyes still shines
Like an
angel
A spirit that won’t
let me go-

Won’t
let me go-
